title: デビュー戦の後に・宵の狭間に

text.jpText:
デビュー戦を走り終え、自身の始動の
手応えを得るメジロアルダンであったが、
レース後に倒れかけるほど疲弊してしまう。
text.enText:
After running her debut race, Mejiro 
Aldan felt she was ready to start her 
career, but she was so exhausted that 
she almost collapsed after the race. 
However, she was so exhausted that she 
almost collapsed after the race.

text.jpText:
病院での診察で大事ないことを確認するも、
メジロアルダンは安静のため、メジロ家が
所持する保養所に運ばれることとなった。
text.enText:
After a checkup at the hospital confirmed 
that she was fine, Mejiro Ardan was taken to 
a sanatorium owned by the Mejiro family for 
rest and relaxation. to a sanatorium owned by 
the Mejiro family.

text.jpText:
彼女が倒れた原因。それはレースを終え、
その心身に蓄積されていた疲労や緊張が
一気に負荷となって現れたことにあった。
text.enText:
What caused her to collapse? The reason was 
that after the race, the fatigue and tension 
that had built up in her body and mind The 
fatigue and tension that had built up in her 
body and mind after the race became a burden.

text.jpText:
メジロ家の主治医は、彼女がレースから
いったん退き、しばらく安静にしているのが
望ましいことを明かす。
text.enText:
The Mejiro family's doctor has indicated that 
it would be best for her to take a break from 
racing and rest for a while. She is not a 
good candidate for a race.

text.jpText:
メジロアルダンのトレーナーとして、
取るべき選択は何か。
その決断が迫られていた……。
text.enText:
As trainer of Mejiro Aldan, what 
choice should I make? That decision 
had to be made. ……
